#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int i,x,sum;
	char a[2000];
	cin>>x;
	cin>>a;
	sum=x;
	i=0;
	while(a[i]!='\0')
    {
    	if(a[i]=='L')
    	{
    		if(sum%2==0)
    		sum=sum/2;
    		else
    		sum=sum/2+1;
    	}
    	else
    	sum=2*sum + 11;
    	i++;
    }
	cout<<sum<<endl;
	return 0;
}
